source:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
  <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15 12a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z" />
  <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M2.458 12C3.732 7.943 7.523 5 12 5c4.478 0 8.268 2.943 9.542 7-1.274 4.057-5.064 7-9.542 7-4.477 0-8.268-2.943-9.542-7z" />
</svg>

root
	header
		pagename "scritti"
		subtitle "a small DSL for rapid prototyping with utility-first CSS frameworks"
		buttons
			button.button
				svg.edit
				"Edit this page!"
			button.button
				svg.github
				"View on GitHub"
	main
		griditem
			item "Describe designs in plain language"
			info "Basic elements are defined with simple descriptors. Structure is implied by indentation."
			info "Document structure is implied by indentation."
		griditem
			demo
				demobackground1
				terminal
					terminaltitle "mycomponent"
					terminalbody
						"card\n  svg.eye\n  details\n    title \"Avg Monthly Views\"\n    value\n      total \"4,500\"\n      change\n        svg.up\n        \"15.5%\"\n  footer\n    link \"More info...\""
		griditem
			demo
				demobackground2
				terminal
					terminaltitle "style/card"
					terminalbody
						"rounded-lg\nshadow\nflex\nflex-col\nitem-start\ndivide-y"
				terminal
					terminaltitle "style/title"
					terminalbody
						"text-sm\nfont-bold\ntext-gray-400"
		griditem
			item "Style elements with your preferred utility-first CSS framework"
			info "Assign sets of classes to elements for easily reuseable elements with minimal repetition."
		griditem
			item "Ideal for rapid prototyping"
			info "Use the development server with hot reload or the browser based editor to explore ideas quickly with live rendering."
		griditem
			card
				row
					svg.eye
					details
						title "Avg Monthly Views"
						value
							total "4,500"
							change
								svg.up
								"15.5%"
				row
					svg.clicks
					details
						title "Avg Monthly Clicks"
						value
							total "1,680"
							change
								svg.up
								"4.2%"
				footer
					link "More info..."
html:
scritti
a small DSL for rapid prototyping with utility-first CSS frameworks
Describe designs in plain language
Basic elements are defined with simple descriptors. Structure is implied by indentation.
Document structure is implied by indentation.
mycomponent
card svg.eye details title "Avg Monthly Views" value total "4,500" change svg.up "15.5%" footer link "More info..."
style/card
rounded-lg shadow flex flex-col item-start divide-y
style/title
text-sm font-bold text-gray-400
Style elements with your preferred utility-first CSS framework
Assign sets of classes to elements for easily reuseable elements with minimal repetition.
Ideal for rapid prototyping
Use the development server with hot reload or the browser based editor to explore ideas quickly with live rendering.
Avg Monthly Views
4,500
15.5%
Avg Monthly Clicks
1,680
4.2%
More info...
